title: Run Final Conflicts Check Before Filing
description: Just before filing a new lawsuit, a partner asks for a final conflicts check to be run, including newly added defendants.

tasks.description: Get the final list of all plaintiffs and defendants.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the complete list of parties.

tasks.description: Run each name through the firm's conflicts database.
Generate a report confirming that no new conflicts have been identified.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the final clearance to file the lawsuit.
